name: Puddel
description:
Puddel:

Follow Puddel, a naïve sentient science experiment on his quest to travel the world! With the help of your friend Chip, use your unique state changing abilities to melt, evaporate and solidify your way through different puzzles and navigate unique camera perspectives to escape the house and travel the globe!

Puddel is a unique 3D platformer, where the objective is to get through levels by using your different state shifting abilities to interact with and traverse the environment around you.

Made in Unity 2018/19.

Controls:

Puddel supports both Keyboard + Mouse and Controller (PS4 / Xbox One)

Keyboard:
  • WSAD : Move
  • 1, 2, 3, 4 : Form Change
  • Spacebar (In Solid Form) : Jump
  • 3 (In Ice Form) : Grab
  • Arrow Keys : Panel Switch
  • Escape : Pause Menu
  • Left Shift : Instant Reset of Level
PS4 Controller:
  •  Left Analog Stick : Move
  • X, Circle, Square, Triangle : Form Change
  • X (In Solid Form) : Jump
  • Square (In Ice Form) : Grab
  • Right Analog Stick : Panel Switch
  • Options : Pause Menu
  • Share : Instant Reset of Leve
  Xbox Controller:
  •  Left Analog Stick : Move
  • A, B, X, Y : Form Change
  • A (In Solid Form) : Jump
  • X (In Ice Form) : Grab
  • Right Analog Stick : Panel Switch
  • Start : Pause Menu
  • Select: Instant Reset of Level
  Dev Controls:
  • Pressing 9 on your keyboard whilst on the main menu will unlock all levels

While in a level :

  • Left DPAD / 8 : Skip back to previous levels
  • Right DPAD / 9 : Skip level forward
Release Info:

Puddel is exclusively available on Itch.io.
